description: artist: Jorge Rivera-Herrans, Luke Holt, Cast of EPIC: The Musical

lyrics.english: Six hundred men
Six hundred men under my command
With only one goal in mind
Make it back alive to our homeland
Six hundred men
Six hundred miles of open sea
But the problem's not the distance
It's what lies in between
And Ithaca's waiting (Ithaca's waiting)
My kingdom is waiting (The kingdom is waiting)
Penelope's waiting for me
So full speed ahead
Full speed ahead
Captain
Eurylochus
Six hundred men (Six hundred men)
Six hundred men with big mouths to feed
and we've run out of supplies to eat
lyrics.korean: 그리고 우린 식량 보급이 다 떨어졌습니다

lyrics.english: (Curse the war, our food store's depleted)
lyrics.korean: (저주받을 전쟁, 우리 식량 창고가 텅 비었어)

lyrics.english: Six hundred men (Six hundred men)
Six hundred reasons to take what we can
lyrics.korean: 우리가 얻을 수 있는 것을 취해도 될 600가지 이유들이 있죠

lyrics.english: So captain, what's the plan?
(Captain, what's the plan?)
Watch where the birds fly (Watch where the birds fly)
lyrics.korean: 새들이 날아가는 곳을 살피게 (새들이 날아가는 곳을 살펴)

lyrics.english: They will lead us to land (They will lead us to land)
lyrics.korean: 우리를 육지로 인도할 테니 (그들이 우리를 육지로 인도할 테니)

lyrics.english: There we'll hunt for food, my second in command
lyrics.korean: 거기서 우리는 식량을 사냥할 걸세, 내 부관이여

lyrics.english: Now full speed ahead (We're up, we're off, and away we go)
We're up, we're off, and away we go
Full speed ahead
We're up, we're off, and away we go
Captain
Polites!
Look!
There in the distance, I see an island
I see a light that faintly glows
Maybe they're people lighting a fire
lyrics.korean: 어쩌면 불을 피우는 사람들이 있을지도 몰라요

lyrics.english: Maybe they'll share some food, who knows?
lyrics.korean: 어쩌면 그들이 음식을 나눠 줄지도요, 누가 압니까?

lyrics.english: Something feels off here
I see fire but there's no smoke
I say we strike first, we don't have time to waste
So let's raid the place and-
No.
Polites, gear up, you and I'll go ahead
lyrics.korean: 폴리테스, 장비를 갖추게, 자네와 내가 앞서 간다

lyrics.english: You and I'll go ahead
We should try to find a way no one ends up dead
lyrics.korean: 누구도 죽지 않을 방법을 찾아야 해

lyrics.english: We don't know what's ahead
lyrics.korean: 저 곳에 무엇이 있을 줄 알고 그러십니까

lyrics.english: Give me till sunrise, and if we don't return
lyrics.korean: 일출까지 시간을 주게, 그리고 우리가 돌아오지 않거든

lyrics.english: Then six hundred men can make this whole place burn
lyrics.korean: 그러면 600명의 병사들이 이 곳 전체를 불사를 수 있을 터

lyrics.english: Now full speed ahead
(SOLDIERS) ODYSSEUS
(전속력으로 전진)
Full speed ahead
(We're up, we're off, and away we go)
Full speed ahead
(We're up, we're off, and away we go)
(We're up, we're off, and a-)
Full speed ahead

title: Full speed ahead
